snippet: For nearly two years the driver sneaked through toll plazas by “piggybacking” on the driver in front of him, according to Metropolitan Transportation Authorities.
abstract: Queens prosecutors charge taxi driver Rodolfo Sanchez with grand larceny, theft of service and criminal possession of stolen property for avoiding toll fares since August 2012.
lead_paragraph: For nearly two years the driver sneaked through toll plazas by “piggybacking” on the driver in front of him, according to Metropolitan Transportation Authorities.

headline.main: Taxi Driver Charged in $28,000 Toll Fraud
